meanings.sent1: The mimeographed flyers were easy to spot with their purple ink.
meanings.sent2: The mimeographed handouts were distributed to all the students.
meanings.sent3: The mimeographed posters made the walls of the classroom look retro.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as clear and crisp as a mimeographed page.
meanings.sent5: The mimeographed documents had a distinct smell that brought back memories of school.

meanings.definition: To reproduce by a mimeograph machine.
meanings.sent1: She mimeographed multiple copies of the worksheet for the class.
meanings.sent2: The teacher mimeographed the test for the students to take home.
meanings.sent3: He mimeographed his silly doodles and handed them out as a joke.
meanings.sent4: The memories were mimeographed in her mind, never to be forgotten.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the mimeograph machine mimeographed its way into the background of the classroom.
